name: account management
description: Account creation, updates, type/category changes, password reset and account cancellation/deletion.

name: address updates
description: Modify shipping or account address details.

name: attribution
description: Identify the customer acquisition source or campaign attribution for a user or account.

name: content & articles
description: Requests to obtain or understand article/content requirements and related content assistance.

name: data & privacy
description: Requests and actions related to consumer data access, reclamation, and privacy rights.

name: feedback & complaints
description: User feedback submissions and formal complaints.

name: financial assistance
description: Requests for direct monetary aid, grants, or other financial support from the organization.

name: help & contact
description: Contacting support and checking support availability/hours.

name: invoices & billing
description: Accessing, downloading or retrieving invoices and bills.

name: legal & compliance
description: Requests and actions to pursue legal proceedings or compliance-related matters.

name: order management
description: Create, cancel, check and track orders, including ETA and shipment status.

name: payments
description: Payment methods, options and resolving payment issues.

name: product discovery
description: Finding and browsing products in the catalog and exploring product information.

name: refunds & compensation
description: Refunds, reimbursements, claims, eligibility, amounts, status and processing.

name: rewards
description: Earning, redeeming or inquiries about promotional items, points, or loyalty rewards.

name: shipping & delivery
description: Delivery-related information such as availability, methods and delivery times.

name: store locations
description: Find physical retail/shopping store locations and related information (addresses, hours, etc.).

name: subscriptions
description: Manage newsletter and service subscriptions (subscribe, unsubscribe, cancel).
